text: @narendramodi @MagufuliJP New rule daily..it is scary now in #Ahmedabad #Gujarat #GujaratHighCourt #COVID19 #COVID #Covid_19 #testing @PMOIndia @drharshvardhan @DrHVoffice NO beds so WHY to hospitalise to get TESTED.
